================
File: public/images/google.svg
================
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!-- Generator: Adobe Illustrator 26.0.1, SVG Export Plug-In . SVG Version: 6.00 Build 0)  -->
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" version="1.1" id="Capa_1" x="0px" y="0px" viewBox="0 0 24 24" style="enable-background:new 0 0 24 24;" xml:space="preserve" width="512" height="512">
<g>

================
File: public/styles.css

body {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  min-height: 100vh;
  font-family: 'Raleway', sans-serif;
}

.hidden {
  display: none;
}

.dropzone {
  border: 2px dashed #ccc;
  padding: 20px;
  text-align: center;
}

.dropzone.dragover {
  border-color: #000;
  background-color: #f0f0f0;
}

.action-column {
  width: 100px;
}

.input-container {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 10px;
}

.page-container {
  max-width: 800px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 40px 0;
  flex: 1;
}

#thumbnail {
  border-radius: 30px;
}

.custom-h1 {
  font-size: 48px;
  font-weight: bold;
}

.button-container {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 10px;
}

.button-container button {
  flex: 1;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.vertical-center {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
}

.navbar {
  background-color: #adadad;
  color: #fff;
  border-radius: 8px;
  position: relative;
}

.navbar #sign-in-button {
  color: white;
  background-color: #adadad;
  border: none;
}

.navbar #sign-up-button {
  color: white;
  background-color: gray;
  border: 1px solid gray;
}

.navbar .menu-horizontal a {
  color: #333;
}

.footer {
  background-color: #adadad;
  color: #fff;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin-top: auto;
}

.container {
  max-width: 800px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 10px 20px;
  min-height: 100vh;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

.modal {
  position: fixed;
  z-index: 1000;
  left: 0;
  top: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  overflow: auto;
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  opacity: 0;
  visibility: hidden;
  pointer-events: none;
  transition: opacity 0.3s, visibility 0.3s;
}

.modal.show {
  opacity: 1;
  visibility: visible;
  pointer-events: auto;
}

.modal-box {
  background-color: #fff;
  padding: 20px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  max-width: 90%;
  width: 400px;
  text-align: center;
}

.modal-box .btn {
  margin-top: 10px;
}

svg.fill-current {
  fill: currentColor;
}

.footer-content {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
}

.footer-content p {
  margin: 0;
}

.email {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  margin-left: 5px;
}

.email-link {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
}

.email-icon {
  width: 16px;
  height: 16px;
  margin-right: 5px;
}

  position: fixed !important;
  z-index: 999 !important;
  z-index: 999 !important;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center !important;
  justify-content: center !important;

}

  --tw-bg-opacity: 1 !important;
  background-color: rgb(243 244 246/var(--tw-bg-opacity)) !important;
}

    margin: 0 20px;

    flex-direction: column;
    gap: 10px;
  }

    flex-direction: column;

    width: 100%;

    flex-direction: column;
  }

    margin-left: 0;
    margin-top: 5px;
  }

    display: block;
  }

    color: #1f2937;
    background-color: white;
    border: none;
  }

    color: white;
    background-color: gray;
    border: 1px solid gray;
  }

  .navbar-end .hidden {
    display: none;
  }
}

  .navbar-end .dropdown {
    display: none;
  }

================
File: public/upload-handler.js
================
// Function to handle file upload with animated progress
async function handleFileUpload(file) {
  const progressContainer = document.getElementById('progress-container');
  const progressBar = document.getElementById('progress-bar');
  const progressPercentage = document.getElementById('progress-percentage');
  const fileName = document.getElementById('file-name');
  const uploadedFilesContainer = document.getElementById('uploaded-files-container');
  const uploadedFilesTitle = document.getElementById('uploaded-files-title');
  const uploadedFilesList = document.getElementById('uploaded-files-list');
  const uploadedFilesHeader = document.getElementById('uploaded-files-header');

  // Show progress container and set initial state
  progressContainer.classList.remove('hidden');
  fileName.textContent = file.name;
  
  // Get the current user
  const user = await window.Clerk.user;
  if (!user) {
    console.error('No user found');
    return;
  }

  // Get bearer token
  const token = await getBearerToken(user.id);
  if (!token) {
    console.error('No token found');
    return;
  }

  // Create XMLHttpRequest object
  const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
  
  // Simulate quick progress to 90%
  let currentProgress = 0;
  const animationInterval = setInterval(() => {
    if (currentProgress < 90) {
      currentProgress += 5;
      progressBar.style.width = `${currentProgress}%`;
      progressPercentage.textContent = `${currentProgress}%`;
    }
  }, 50);

  // Handle actual upload progress
  xhr.upload.addEventListener('progress', (event) => {
    if (event.lengthComputable) {
      // Only update progress if it's greater than our simulated progress
      const actualProgress = Math.round((event.loaded / event.total) * 100);
      if (actualProgress > currentProgress) {
        clearInterval(animationInterval);
        currentProgress = actualProgress;
        progressBar.style.width = `${currentProgress}%`;
        progressPercentage.textContent = `${currentProgress}%`;
      }
    }
  });

  // Handle upload completion
  xhr.addEventListener('load', () => {
    clearInterval(animationInterval);
    progressBar.style.width = '100%';
    progressPercentage.textContent = '100%';
    
    // Add success styling
    progressBar.classList.add('bg-emerald-500');
    progressPercentage.classList.add('text-emerald-500');
    
    if (xhr.status === 200) {
      try {
        const response = JSON.parse(xhr.responseText);
        
        // Show the uploaded files container and title
        if (uploadedFilesContainer) uploadedFilesContainer.style.display = 'block';
        if (uploadedFilesTitle) uploadedFilesTitle.style.display = 'block';

        // Set up the table header if it doesn't exist
        if (uploadedFilesHeader && !uploadedFilesHeader.hasChildNodes()) {
          uploadedFilesHeader.innerHTML = `
            <tr>
              <th scope="col" class="px-6 py-3">File Name</th>
              <th scope="col" class="px-6 py-3">Status</th>
              <th scope="col" class="px-6 py-3">Actions</th>
            </tr>
          `;
        }

        // Add the file to the list
        if (uploadedFilesList) {
          const row = document.createElement('tr');
          row.className = 'bg-white border-b dark:bg-gray-800 dark:border-gray-700';
          row.innerHTML = `
            <td class="px-6 py-4 font-medium text-gray-900 whitespace-nowrap dark:text-white">
              ${file.name}
            </td>
            <td class="px-6 py-4">
              <span class="bg-emerald-100 text-emerald-800 text-xs font-medium me-2 px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded dark:bg-emerald-900 dark:text-emerald-300">
                ${response.status || 'Processing'}
              </span>
            </td>
            <td class="px-6 py-4">
              <a href="${response.download_url}" class="font-medium text-emerald-600 dark:text-emerald-500 hover:underline">Download</a>
            </td>
          `;
          uploadedFilesList.appendChild(row);
        }

        // Refresh credit balance after successful upload
        updateCreditBalance();
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error parsing upload response:', error);
      }
    }
    
    // Optional: Hide progress after a delay
    setTimeout(() => {
      progressContainer.classList.add('hidden');
      // Reset progress bar state
      progressBar.style.width = '0%';
      progressBar.classList.remove('bg-emerald-500');
      progressPercentage.classList.remove('text-emerald-500');
      progressPercentage.textContent = '0%';
    }, 2000);
  });

  // Handle upload error
  xhr.addEventListener('error', () => {
    clearInterval(animationInterval);
    progressBar.classList.add('bg-red-500');
    progressPercentage.classList.add('text-red-500');
    
    // Add error row to the list
    if (uploadedFilesList) {
      const row = document.createElement('tr');
      row.className = 'bg-white border-b dark:bg-gray-800 dark:border-gray-700';
      row.innerHTML = `
        <td class="px-6 py-4 font-medium text-gray-900 whitespace-nowrap dark:text-white">
          ${file.name}
        </td>
        <td class="px-6 py-4">
          <span class="bg-red-100 text-red-800 text-xs font-medium me-2 px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded dark:bg-red-900 dark:text-red-300">
            Failed
          </span>
        </td>
        <td class="px-6 py-4">
          <button onclick="handleFileUpload('${file}')" class="font-medium text-red-600 dark:text-red-500 hover:underline">Retry</button>
        </td>
      `;
      uploadedFilesList.appendChild(row);
    }
  });

  // Set up the request with FastAPI endpoint
  xhr.open('POST', `${FASTAPI_BASE_URL}/upload?user_id=${user.id}`, true);
  xhr.setRequestHeader('Authorization', `Bearer ${token}`);
  
  // Create FormData and append file
  const formData = new FormData();
  formData.append('file', file);
  
  // Send the request
  xhr.send(formData);
}

// Add event listeners for file input and drag & drop
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
  const dropzone = document.getElementById('dropzone-file');
  const fileInput = document.getElementById('clickUpload');

  if (fileInput) {
    fileInput.addEventListener('change', (event) => {
      const files = event.target.files;
      if (files.length > 0) {
        handleFileUpload(files[0]);
      }
    });
  }

  if (dropzone) {
    dropzone.addEventListener('dragover', (event) => {
      event.preventDefault();
      event.stopPropagation();
      dropzone.classList.add('border-emerald-500');
    });

    dropzone.addEventListener('dragleave', (event) => {
      event.preventDefault();
      event.stopPropagation();
      dropzone.classList.remove('border-emerald-500');
    });

    dropzone.addEventListener('drop', (event) => {
      event.preventDefault();
      event.stopPropagation();
      dropzone.classList.remove('border-emerald-500');
      
      const files = event.dataTransfer.files;
      if (files.length > 0) {
        handleFileUpload(files[0]);
      }
    });
  }
});

================
File: railway.json
================
{
    "$schema": "https://railway.app/railway.schema.json",
    "build": {
      "builder": "NIXPACKS",
      "buildCommand": "npm install",
      "start": "node index.js --production"
    },
    "deploy": {
      "startCommand": "npm start",
      "healthcheckPath": "/",
      "healthcheckTimeout": 100,
      "restartPolicyType": "ON_FAILURE",
      "restartPolicyMaxRetries": 10
    }
  }

================
File: README.md
================
# Bank Statements Conversion Platform

A secure and efficient platform for converting bank statements from PDF to Excel/CSV formats. This application ensures the highest standards of encryption and privacy, safeguarding your data at all times.

## Features

- **Secure Conversion**: All data is encrypted both at rest and in transit.
- **Accurate Conversion**: High accuracy in converting bank statements to Excel/CSV.
- **User-Friendly Interface**: Intuitive and easy-to-use interface.
- **Pricing Plans**: Flexible pricing plans to suit different needs.

Test update of the website

================
File: tailwind.config.js
================
// tailwind.config.js
/**
 * @type {import('@types/tailwindcss/tailwind-config').TailwindConfig}
 */
module.exports = {
  content: [
    './public/**/*.html',
    './src/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx}',
    './pages/**/*.{ts,tsx}',
    './node_modules/flowbite-react/lib/**/*.js',  // Added Flowbite React paths
  ],
  theme: {
    extend: {},
  },
  plugins: [
    require('@tailwindcss/typography'),
    require('flowbite/plugin'),
  ],
};

<section class="bg-white dark:bg-gray-900">
    <div class="py-8 px-4 mx-auto max-w-screen-xl text-center sm:py-16 lg:px-6">
        <h2 class="mb-4 text-4xl tracking-tight font-extrabold text-gray-900 dark:text-white">The most trusted PDF to Excel/CSV conversion platform</h2>
        <p class="text-gray-500 sm:text-xl dark:text-gray-400">Here are a few reasons why you should choose our platform</p>
        <div class="mt-8 lg:mt-12 space-y-8 md:grid md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 md:gap-12 md:space-y-0">
            <div>
                <svg class="mx-auto mb-4 w-12 h-12 text-primary-600 dark:text-primary-500" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                    <path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M6.625 2.655A9 9 0 0119 11a1 1 0 11-2 0 7 7 0 00-9.625-6.492 1 1 0 11-.75-1.853zM4.662 4.959A1 1 0 014.75 6.37 6.97 6.97 0 003 11a1 1 0 11-2 0 8.97 8.97 0 012.25-5.953 1 1 0 011.412-.088z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path>
                    <path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M5 11a5 5 0 1110 0 1 1 0 11-2 0 3 3 0 10-6 0c0 1.677-.345 3.276-.968 4.729a1 1 0 11-1.838-.789A9.964 9.964 0 005 11zm8.921 2.012a1 1 0 01.831 1.145 19.86 19.86 0 01-.545 2.436 1 1 0 11-1.92-.558c.207-.713.371-1.445.49-2.192a1 1 0 011.144-.83z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path>
                    <path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 10a1 1 0 011 1c0 2.236-.46 4.368-1.29 6.304a1 1 0 01-1.838-.789A13.952 13.952 0 009 11a1 1 0 011-1z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path>
                </svg>
                <h3 class="mb-2 text-xl font-bold dark:text-white">Secure and Encrypted</h3>
                <p class="mb-4 text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400">We ensure your data is 100% encrypted at rest and in transit, providing top-notch security.</p>
            </div>
            <div>
                <svg class="mx-auto mb-4 w-12 h-12 text-primary-600 dark:text-primary-500" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

                </svg>
                <h3 class="mb-2 text-xl font-bold dark:text-white">Highly Accurate</h3>
                <p class="mb-4 text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400">Our conversion process ensures the highest level of accuracy, so you can trust the data you receive.</p>
            </div>
            <div>
                <svg class="mx-auto mb-4 w-12 h-12 text-primary-600 dark:text-primary-500" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

                <p class="mb-4 text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400">Our platform is trusted by professionals worldwide for its reliability and precision.</p>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</section>

        </a>

</footer>

================
File: views/header.ejs
================
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8" />
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
  <title><%= typeof title !== 'undefined' ? title : 'Bank-statements.co - Convert PDF tables to Excel and CSV files' %></title>
  <meta name="description" content="<%= typeof description !== 'undefined' ? description : 'Most secure PDF table to Excel and CSV converter - Bank grade encryption.' %>">

  <!-- Open Graph Tags -->
  <meta property="og:title" content="<%= typeof title !== 'undefined' ? title : 'Bank-statements.co - Convert PDF tables to Excel and CSV files' %>" />
  <meta property="og:description" content="<%= typeof description !== 'undefined' ? description : 'Most secure PDF table to Excel and CSV converter - Bank grade encryption.' %>" />
  <meta property="og:image" content="https://www.vidscript.co/images/vidscript-opengraph.png" />
  <meta property="og:url" content="<%= typeof url !== 'undefined' ? url : '' %>" />
  <meta property="og:type" content="website" />

  <!-- Canonical Link -->
  <link rel="canonical" href="<%= typeof url !== 'undefined' ? url : '' %>" />

  <!-- Favicon -->
  <link href="/favicon.ico" rel="icon" type="image/x-icon" />

  <!-- CSS and JS Links -->
  <link href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flowbite/2.3.0/flowbite.min.css"  rel="stylesheet" />
  <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/daisyui@2.51.6/dist/full.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" />
  <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>
  <!-- Load Flowbite before app.js -->
  <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flowbite/2.3.0/flowbite.min.js"></script>
  <!-- Clerk will be loaded dynamically by app.js -->
  <script>
    window.CLERK_PUBLISHABLE_KEY = "<%= clerkPublishableKey %>";
  </script>
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@tailwindcss/typography@latest/dist/typography.min.css" />
  <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Raleway:wght@400;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet" />
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="/styles.css" />
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="/clerk-modal.css" />
  <script src="/app.js"></script>
  <script src="/clerk-fix.js"></script>
  <script defer src="https://analytics.vertial.com/script.js" data-website-id="41327be9-e06f-45b7-949e-f6c75fa382a5"></script>
  <script>
    window.FASTAPI_BASE_URL = '<%= process.env.FASTAPI_BASE_URL %>';
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">window.$crisp=[];window.CRISP_WEBSITE_ID="e25671d8-0b3e-4573-b079-400a592627b4";(function(){d=document;s=d.createElement("script");s.src="https://client.crisp.chat/l.js";s.async=1;d.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(s);})();</script>
  <script
type="text/javascript"
src="//static.klaviyo.com/onsite/js/klaviyo.js?company_id=VBrXxU"
></script>
</head>

================
File: views/index.ejs
================
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <%- include('header') %>
  <body style="position: static; overflow-x: hidden;">
    <div class="container" style="position: relative; z-index: 1;">
      <%- include('navbar', { isAuthenticated: isAuthenticated, creditBalance: creditBalance })  %>
      <div class="page-container" style="z-index: 1;">
      <div class="page-container" style="z-index: 1;">
        <h1 class="text-center mb-8 custom-h1">Convert PDF bank statements to Excel securely</h1>
        <!-- Upload component -->
        <div id="dropzone-file" class="flex items-center justify-center w-full">
          <label 
            id="dropzonelabel" 
            <%= isAuthenticated ? 'for="clickUpload"' : '' %>
            class="flex flex-col items-center justify-center w-full h-64 border-2 border-gray-300 border-dashed rounded-lg cursor-pointer bg-gray-50 dark:hover:bg-bray-800 dark:bg-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-100 dark:border-gray-600 dark:hover:border-gray-500 dark:hover:bg-gray-600"
          >
            <div class="flex flex-col items-center justify-center pt-5 pb-6">
              <svg class="w-8 h-8 mb-4 text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400" aria-hidden="true" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 20 16">
                <path stroke="currentColor" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M13 13h3a3 3 0 0 0 0-6h-.025A5.56 5.56 0 0 0 16 6.5 5.5 5.5 0 0 0 5.207 5.021C5.137 5.017 5.071 5 5 5a4 4 0 0 0 0 8h2.167M10 15V6m0 0L8 8m2-2 2 2"/>
              </svg>
              <p class="mb-2 text-sm text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400">
                <span class="font-semibold">Click to upload</span> or drag and drop
              </p>
              <p class="text-xs text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400">PDF files only</p>
            </div>
            <% if (isAuthenticated) { %>
              <input id="clickUpload" type="file" class="hidden" multiple accept=".pdf" />
            <% } %>
          </label>
        </div>
        <!-- Progress bar -->
        <div id="progress-container" class="hidden mt-4">
          <div class="flex justify-between mb-1">
            <span id="file-name" class="text-base font-medium text-emerald-500 dark:text-white"></span>
            <span id="progress-percentage" class="text-sm font-medium text-emerald-500 dark:text-white">0%</span>
          </div>
          <div class="w-full bg-gray-200 rounded-full h-2.5 dark:bg-gray-700">
            <div id="progress-bar" class="bg-emerald-400 h-2.5 rounded-full" style="width: 0%"></div>
          </div>
        </div>
        
        <!-- File list container -->
        <div id="file-list-container" class="mt-8">
          <!-- Files will be dynamically added here -->
        </div>
        
        <!-- Uploaded files list -->
        <div id="uploaded-files-container" class="mt-8">
          <h2 id="uploaded-files-title" class="text-xl font-semibold mb-4 text-center" style="display: none;">Uploaded Files</h2>
          <div class="relative overflow-x-auto">
            <table class="w-full text-sm text-left rtl:text-right text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400">
              <thead id="uploaded-files-header" class="text-xs text-gray-700 uppercase bg-gray-50 dark:bg-gray-700 dark:text-gray-400">
                <!-- Table headers will be inserted here -->
              </thead>
              <tbody id="uploaded-files-list">
                <!-- Dynamically generated table rows will be inserted here -->
              </tbody>
            </table>
          </div>
        </div>
        
        <!-- File list container -->
        <div id="file-list-container" class="mt-8">
          <!-- Files will be dynamically added here -->
        </div>
        
        <!-- Uploaded files list -->
        <div id="uploaded-files-container" class="mt-8">

              </thead>
              <tbody id="uploaded-files-list">
                <!-- Dynamically generated table rows will be inserted here -->
              </tbody>
            </table>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
              
      <div id="popup-modal" data-modal-target="popup-modal" tabindex="-1" class="hidden overflow-y-auto overflow-x-hidden fixed top-0 right-0 left-0 z-50 justify-center items-center w-full md:inset-0 h-[calc(100%-0rem)] max-h-full bs_popup_dropzone">
        <div class="relative p-4 w-full max-w-md max-h-full">
            <div class="relative bg-white rounded-lg shadow dark:bg-gray-700">
                <button type="button" class="absolute top-3 end-2.5 text-gray-400 bg-transparent hover:bg-gray-200 hover:text-gray-900 rounded-lg text-sm w-8 h-8 ms-auto inline-flex justify-center items-center dark:hover:bg-gray-600 dark:hover:text-white" data-modal-hide="popup-modal">
                    <svg class="w-3 h-3" aria-hidden="true" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 14 14">
                        <path stroke="currentColor" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="m1 1 6 6m0 0 6 6M7 7l6-6M7 7l-6 6"/>
                    </svg>

                </button>

                    </svg>
                    <h3 class="mb-5 text-lg font-normal text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400">You need to have an account to upload your files - get 50 credits FREE when you sign up.</h3>
                    <button data-modal-hide="popup-modal" type="button" class="py-2.5 px-5 text-sm font-medium text-gray-900 focus:outline-none bg-white rounded-lg border border-gray-200 hover:bg-gray-100 hover:text-emerald-500 focus:z-10 focus:ring-4 focus:ring-gray-100 dark:focus:ring-gray-700 dark:bg-gray-800 dark:text-gray-400 dark:border-gray-600 dark:hover:text-white dark:hover:bg-gray-700">No, thank you</button>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
      </div>

<div class="navbar bg-base-100">
  <div class="navbar-start">
    <a href="/" class="btn btn-ghost text-xl">
      <img src="Bankstatements_Logo_Basic.svg" alt="Bank-statements.co Logo" class="h-10 mr-2" />
      Bank-statements
    </a>
  </div>
  <div class="navbar-end sm:hidden">
    <div class="dropdown dropdown-end" id="hamburgerMenu">
    <div class="dropdown dropdown-end" id="hamburgerMenu">
      <div tabindex="0" role="button" class="btn btn-ghost btn-circle">
        <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-5 w-5" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor">
          <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M4 6h16M4 12h16M4 18h16" />
        </svg>
      </div>
      <ul tabindex="0" class="menu menu-sm dropdown-content mt-3 z-[1] p-2 shadow bg-base-100 rounded-box w-52 right-0" style="color: #333;">       
        <li><a id="dropdown-sign-in-button">Login</a></li>
        <li><a id="dropdown-sign-up-button">Sign Up</a></li>
      </ul>
    </div>
    <div class="dropdown dropdown-end" id="userAvatarDropdownSmall">
    <div class="dropdown dropdown-end" id="userAvatarDropdownSmall">
      <div tabindex="0" role="button" class="btn btn-ghost btn-circle avatar">
        <div class="w-10 rounded-full">
          <img alt="User Avatar" id="userAvatarImgSmall" src="" />
        </div>
      </div>
      <ul tabindex="0" class="menu menu-sm dropdown-content mt-3 z-[1] p-2 shadow bg-base-100 rounded-box w-52 right-0" style="color: #333;">
        <li>
          <a href="/#pricing" class="flex items-center justify-between">

            <div class="badge badge-primary" id="creditBalance"></div>
          </a>
        </li>
        <li><a id="manage-subscription-small">Manage Subscription</a></li>
        <li><a id="profile-link-small">Profile</a></li>
        <li><a id="sign-out-button-small">Logout</a></li>
      </ul>
    </div>
  </div>

    <div class="tooltip tooltip-bottom" data-tip="Click here to buy more credits">
      <a href="/#pricing" class="btn btn-ghost">
        <div class="flex items-center gap-2">
          <span>CREDIT(S):</span>
          <div class="badge badge-primary" id="creditBalanceDesktop"></div>
        </div>

          </a>
        </li>

          <a href="/#pricing" class="flex items-center justify-between">
            <span>Credit(s):</span>
            <span class="badge badge-primary ml-2" id="creditBalanceDropdown"><%= creditBalance.toLocaleString() %></span>
          </a>
        </li>
        <li><a id="manage-subscription">Manage Subscription</a></li>
        <li><a id="profile-link">Profile</a></li>
        <li><a id="sign-out-button">Logout</a></li>
      </ul>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<script>
async function updateCreditBalance() {
  const mobileCredit = document.getElementById('creditBalance');
  const desktopCredit = document.getElementById('creditBalanceDropdown');
  const creditBalanceDesktop = document.querySelector('.navbar-end .tooltip .badge');
  
  const desktopCredit = document.getElementById('creditBalanceDropdown');
  const creditBalanceDesktop = document.querySelector('.navbar-end .tooltip .badge');
  
  try {
    const response = await fetch('/api/creditBalance');
    if (response.ok) {
      const data = await response.json();
      const balance = data.totalCredits || 0;
      
      // Update mobile credit display
      if (mobileCredit) {
        mobileCredit.textContent = balance;
        mobileCredit.closest('li').style.display = 'block';
      }
      
      // Update dropdown credit display
      if (desktopCredit) {
        desktopCredit.textContent = balance;
      }
      
      // Update desktop tooltip credit display
      if (creditBalanceDesktop) {
        creditBalanceDesktop.textContent = balance;
        creditBalanceDesktop.closest('.tooltip').style.display = 'block';
      }
      
      console.log('Credit balance updated successfully:', balance);
      
      // Update mobile credit display
      if (mobileCredit) {
        mobileCredit.textContent = balance;
        mobileCredit.closest('li').style.display = 'block';
      }
      
      // Update dropdown credit display
      if (desktopCredit) {
        desktopCredit.textContent = balance;
      }
      
      // Update desktop tooltip credit display
      if (creditBalanceDesktop) {
        creditBalanceDesktop.textContent = balance;
        creditBalanceDesktop.closest('.tooltip').style.display = 'block';
      }
      
      console.log('Credit balance updated successfully:', balance);
    } else {
      console.error('Failed to retrieve credit balance');
      if (mobileCredit) mobileCredit.textContent = '0';
      if (desktopCredit) desktopCredit.textContent = '0';
      if (creditBalanceDesktop) creditBalanceDesktop.textContent = '0';
      if (creditBalanceDesktop) creditBalanceDesktop.textContent = '0';
    }
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Error retrieving credit balance:', error);
    if (mobileCredit) mobileCredit.textContent = '0';
    if (desktopCredit) desktopCredit.textContent = '0';
    if (creditBalanceDesktop) creditBalanceDesktop.textContent = '0';
    if (creditBalanceDesktop) creditBalanceDesktop.textContent = '0';
  }
}

// Check if user is already authenticated on page load
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', async () => {
  // Wait a short time to ensure Clerk is fully initialized
  setTimeout(async () => {
    if (window.Clerk && window.Clerk.user) {
      console.log('User already authenticated on page load, updating credit balance');
      await updateCreditBalance();
    }
  }, 500);
});

// Check if user is already authenticated on page load
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', async () => {
  // Wait a short time to ensure Clerk is fully initialized
  setTimeout(async () => {
    if (window.Clerk && window.Clerk.user) {
      console.log('User already authenticated on page load, updating credit balance');
      await updateCreditBalance();
    }
  }, 500);
});
</script>

================
File: views/poweredby.ejs
================
<section class="bg-white dark:bg-gray-900">
    <div class="py-8 lg:py-16 mx-auto max-w-screen-xl px-4">
        <h2 class="mb-8 lg:mb-16 text-3xl font-extrabold tracking-tight leading-tight text-center text-gray-900 dark:text-white md:text-4xl">Powered by</h2>
        <div class="grid grid-cols-2 gap-8 text-gray-500 sm:gap-12 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-6 dark:text-gray-400">
            <div class="flex justify-center items-center pointer-events-none">
                <img src="/images/docker.svg" class="h-9 filter-gray-300" alt="Docker">
            </div>
            <div class="flex justify-center items-center pointer-events-none">
                <img src="/images/google.svg" class="h-8 filter-gray-300" alt="Google">
            </div>
            <div class="flex justify-center items-center pointer-events-none">
                <img src="/images/js.svg" class="h-9 filter-gray-300" alt="Javascript">
            </div>
            <div class="flex justify-center items-center pointer-events-none">
                <img src="/images/node-js.svg" class="h-9 filter-gray-300" alt="Nodejs">
            </div>
            <div class="flex justify-center items-center pointer-events-none">
                <img src="/images/postgre.svg" class="h-9 filter-gray-300" alt="Postgres">
            </div>
            <div class="flex justify-center items-center pointer-events-none">
                <img src="/images/stripe.svg" class="h-6 filter-gray-300" alt="Stripe">
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</section>

<style>
    .filter-gray-300 {
        filter: invert(39%) sepia(2%) saturate(0%) hue-rotate(177deg) brightness(93%) contrast(90%);
    }
</style>

================
File: views/pricing.ejs
================
<section id="pricing" class="bg-white dark:bg-gray-900">
  <div class="py-8 px-4 mx-auto max-w-screen-xl lg:py-16 lg:px-6">
    <div class="mx-auto max-w-screen-md text-center mb-8 lg:mb-12">
      <h2 class="mb-4 text-4xl tracking-tight font-extrabold text-gray-900 dark:text-white">
        Designed for businesses of all sizes
      </h2>
      <p class="mb-5 font-light text-gray-500 sm:text-xl dark:text-gray-400">
        At Bank-statements.co, we focus on providing secure and efficient solutions to convert your bank statements from PDF to Excel. Our platform ensures the highest standards of encryption and privacy, safeguarding your data at all times.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="space-y-8 lg:grid lg:grid-cols-3 sm:gap-6 xl:gap-10 lg:space-y-0">
      <!-- Pricing Card -->
      <div class="flex flex-col p-6 mx-auto max-w-lg text-center text-gray-900 bg-white rounded-lg border border-gray-100 shadow dark:border-gray-600 xl:p-8 dark:bg-gray-800 dark:text-white">
        <h3 class="mb-4 text-2xl font-semibold">Starter</h3>
        <p class="font-light text-gray-500 sm:text-lg dark:text-gray-400">
          Best option for personal use & for your next project.
        </p>
        <div class="flex justify-center items-baseline my-8">
          <span class="mr-2 text-5xl font-extrabold">$29</span>
          <span class="text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400">/month</span>
        </div>
        <!-- List -->
        <ul role="list" class="mb-8 space-y-4 text-left">
          <li class="flex items-center space-x-3">
            <!-- Icon -->
            <svg class="flex-shrink-0 w-5 h-5 text-green-500 dark:text-green-400" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
              <path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M16.707 5.293a1 1 0 010 1.414l-8 8a1 1 0 01-1.414 0l-4-4a1 1 0 011.414-1.414L8 12.586l7.293-7.293a1 1 0 011.414 0z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path>
            </svg>
            <span><span class="font-semibold">350</span> credits per month</span>
          </li>
          <li class="flex items-center space-x-3">
            <!-- Icon -->
            <svg class="flex-shrink-0 w-5 h-5 text-green-500 dark:text-green-400" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
              <path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M16.707 5.293a1 1 0 010 1.414l-8 8a1 1 0 01-1.414 0l-4-4a1 1 0 011.414-1.414L8 12.586l7.293-7.293a1 1 0 011.414 0z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path>
            </svg>
            <span><span class="font-semibold">8.3 cents</span> per page</span>
          </li>
          <li class="flex items-center space-x-3">
            <!-- Icon -->
            <svg class="flex-shrink-0 w-5 h-5 text-green-500 dark:text-green-400" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
              <path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M16.707 5.293a1 1 0 010 1.414l-8 8a1 1 0 01-1.414 0l-4-4a1 1 0 011.414-1.414L8 12.586l7.293-7.293a1 1 0 011.414 0z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path>
            </svg>
            <span>No setup, or hidden fees</span>
          </li>
        </ul>
        <% if (isAuthenticated) { %>
          <a href="<%= stripeStarterLink %>?prefilled_email=<%= userEmail %>&client_reference_id=<%= userId %>" class="text-white bg-emerald-400 hover:bg-primary-700 focus:ring-4 focus:ring-primary-200 font-medium rounded-lg text-sm px-5 py-2.5 text-center dark:text-white dark:focus:ring-primary-900">Subscribe Now</a>
        <% } else { %>
          <button class="sign-up-button text-white bg-emerald-400 hover:bg-primary-700 focus:ring-4 focus:ring-primary-200 font-medium rounded-lg text-sm px-5 py-2.5 text-center dark:text-white dark:focus:ring-primary-900">Sign Up</button>
        <% } %>
      </div>
      <!-- Pricing Card -->
      <div class="flex flex-col p-6 mx-auto max-w-lg text-center text-gray-900 bg-white rounded-lg border border-gray-100 shadow dark:border-gray-600 xl:p-8 dark:bg-gray-800 dark:text-white">
        <h3 class="mb-4 text-2xl font-semibold">Pro</h3>
        <p class="font-light text-gray-500 sm:text-lg dark:text-gray-400">
          Relevant for small businesses and users with large pdfs.
        </p>
        <div class="flex justify-center items-baseline my-8">
          <span class="mr-2 text-5xl font-extrabold">$49</span>
          <span class="text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400">/month</span>
        </div>
        <!-- List -->
        <ul role="list" class="mb-8 space-y-4 text-left">
          <li class="flex items-center space-x-3">
            <!-- Icon -->
            <svg class="flex-shrink-0 w-5 h-5 text-green-500 dark:text-green-400" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
              <path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M16.707 5.293a1 1 0 010 1.414l-8 8a1 1 0 01-1.414 0l-4-4a1 1 0 011.414-1.414L8 12.586l7.293-7.293a1 1 0 011.414 0z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path>
            </svg>
            <span><span class="font-semibold">800</span> credits per month</span>
          </li>
          <li class="flex items-center space-x-3">
            <!-- Icon -->
            <svg class="flex-shrink-0 w-5 h-5 text-green-500 dark:text-green-400" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
              <path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M16.707 5.293a1 1 0 010 1.414l-8 8a1 1 0 01-1.414 0l-4-4a1 1 0 011.414-1.414L8 12.586l7.293-7.293a1 1 0 011.414 0z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path>
            </svg>
            <span><span class="font-semibold">6 cents</span> per page</span>
          </li>
          <li class="flex items-center space-x-3">
            <!-- Icon -->
            <svg class="flex-shrink-0 w-5 h-5 text-green-500 dark:text-green-400" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
              <path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M16.707 5.293a1 1 0 010 1.414l-8 8a1 1 0 01-1.414 0l-4-4a1 1 0 011.414-1.414L8 12.586l7.293-7.293a1 1 0 011.414 0z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path>
            </svg>
            <span>No setup, or hidden fees</span>
          </li>
        </ul>
        <% if (isAuthenticated) { %>
          <a href="<%= stripeProLink %>?prefilled_email=<%= userEmail %>&client_reference_id=<%= userId %>" class="text-white bg-emerald-400 hover:bg-primary-700 focus:ring-4 focus:ring-primary-200 font-medium rounded-lg text-sm px-5 py-2.5 text-center dark:text-white dark:focus:ring-primary-900">Subscribe Now</a>
        <% } else { %>
          <button class="sign-up-button text-white bg-emerald-400 hover:bg-primary-700 focus:ring-4 focus:ring-primary-200 font-medium rounded-lg text-sm px-5 py-2.5 text-center dark:text-white dark:focus:ring-primary-900">Sign Up</button>
        <% } %>
      </div>
      <!-- Pricing Card -->
      <div class="flex flex-col p-6 mx-auto max-w-lg text-center text-gray-900 bg-white rounded-lg border border-gray-100 shadow dark:border-gray-600 xl:p-8 dark:bg-gray-800 dark:text-white">
        <h3 class="mb-4 text-2xl font-semibold">Enterprise</h3>
        <p class="font-light text-gray-500 sm:text-lg dark:text-gray-400">
          Best for accountants and large scale users.
        </p>
        <div class="flex justify-center items-baseline my-8">
          <span class="mr-2 text-5xl font-extrabold">$99</span>
          <span class="text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400">/month</span>
        </div>
        <!-- List -->
        <ul role="list" class="mb-8 space-y-4 text-left">
          <li class="flex items-center space-x-3">
            <!-- Icon -->
            <svg class="flex-shrink-0 w-5 h-5 text-green-500 dark:text-green-400" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
              <path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M16.707 5.293a1 1 0 010 1.414l-8 8a1 1 0 01-1.414 0l-4-4a1 1 0 011.414-1.414L8 12.586l7.293-7.293a1 1 0 011.414 0z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path>
            </svg>
            <span><span class="font-semibold">3,000</span> credits per month</span>
          </li>
          <li class="flex items-center space-x-3">
            <!-- Icon -->
            <svg class="flex-shrink-0 w-5 h-5 text-green-500 dark:text-green-400" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
              <path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M16.707 5.293a1 1 0 010 1.414l-8 8a1 1 0 01-1.414 0l-4-4a1 1 0 011.414-1.414L8 12.586l7.293-7.293a1 1 0 011.414 0z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path>
            </svg>
            <span><span class="font-semibold">3.3 cents</span> per page</span>
          </li>
          <li class="flex items-center space-x-3">
            <!-- Icon -->
            <svg class="flex-shrink-0 w-5 h-5 text-green-500 dark:text-green-400" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
              <path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M16.707 5.293a1 1 0 010 1.414l-8 8a1 1 0 01-1.414 0l-4-4a1 1 0 011.414-1.414L8 12.586l7.293-7.293a1 1 0 011.414 0z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path>
            </svg>
            <span>No setup, or hidden fees</span>
          </li>
        </ul>
        <% if (isAuthenticated) { %>
          <a href="<%= stripeEnterpriseLink %>?prefilled_email=<%= userEmail %>&client_reference_id=<%= userId %>" class="text-white bg-emerald-400 hover:bg-primary-700 focus:ring-4 focus:ring-primary-200 font-medium rounded-lg text-sm px-5 py-2.5 text-center dark:text-white dark:focus:ring-primary-900">Subscribe Now</a>
        <% } else { %>
          <button class="sign-up-button text-white bg-emerald-400 hover:bg-primary-700 focus:ring-4 focus:ring-primary-200 font-medium rounded-lg text-sm px-5 py-2.5 text-center dark:text-white dark:focus:ring-primary-900">Sign Up</button>
        <% } %>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</section>

================
File: views/pricing02.ejs
================

  <div class="py-8 px-4 mx-auto max-w-screen-xl sm:py-16 lg:px-6">
      <div class="mx-auto max-w-screen-md text-center mb-8 lg:mb-12">

          <p class="mb-5 font-light text-gray-500 sm:text-xl dark:text-gray-400">Here at Flowbite we focus on markets where technology, innovation, and capital can unlock long-term value and drive economic growth.</p>
          <div class="flex justify-center items-center">
              <span class="text-base font-medium text-gray-900 dark:text-white">
                Monthly
              </span>
              <!-- Switch Container -->
              <div>
                <label for="toggle-example" class="flex relative items-center mx-4 cursor-pointer">
                  <input type="checkbox" id="toggle-example" class="sr-only">

                </label>
              </div>
              <span class="text-base font-medium text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400">
                Yearly
              </span>
          </div>
      </div>

                  </li>
                  <li class="flex items-center space-x-3 text-gray-500">
                      <!-- Icon -->
                      <svg class="flex-shrink-0 w-5 h-5" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M11 17a1 1 0 001.447.894l4-2A1 1 0 0017 15V9.236a1 1 0 00-1.447-.894l-4 2a1 1 0 00-.553.894V17zM15.211 6.276a1 1 0 000-1.788l-4.764-2.382a1 1 0 00-.894 0L4.789 4.488a1 1 0 000 1.788l4.764 2.382a1 1 0 00.894 0l4.764-2.382zM4.447 8.342A1 1 0 003 9.236V15a1 1 0 00.553.894l4 2A1 1 0 009 17v-5.764a1 1 0 00-.553-.894l-4-2z"></path></svg>
                      <span class="line-through">Robust developer platform</span>
                  </li>
              </ul>
          </div>
          <!-- Pricing Card -->
          <div class="flex flex-col p-6 mx-auto max-w-xl text-center bg-white rounded-lg border border-gray-200 shadow xl:max-w-lg dark:border-gray-700 dark:bg-gray-800 xl:p-8">
              <h3 class="mb-4 text-2xl font-medium text-gray-900 dark:text-white">Enterprise</h3>
              <span class="text-5xl font-extrabold text-gray-900 dark:text-white">$599</span>
              <p class="mt-4 mb-1 text-gray-500 text-light dark:text-gray-400">$499 USD per month, paid annually</p>
              <a href="#" class="inline-flex justify-center items-center font-medium text-primary-600 hover:text-primary-800 dark:text-primary-500 dark:hover:text-primary-700">
                  Go to annual plan
                  <svg class="ml-2 w-5 h-5" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M12.293 5.293a1 1 0 011.414 0l4 4a1 1 0 010 1.414l-4 4a1 1 0 01-1.414-1.414L14.586 11H3a1 1 0 110-2h11.586l-2.293-2.293a1 1 0 010-1.414z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>
              </a>
              <a href="#" class="text-white bg-gray-900 hover:bg-gray-700 focus:ring-4 focus:ring-gray-200 font-medium rounded-lg text-sm px-5 py-2.5 text-center my-8 dark:bg-gray-600 dark:text-white  dark:hover:bg-gray-500 dark:focus:ring-gray-600">Get started</a>
              <!-- List -->
              <ul role="list" class="space-y-4 text-left text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-400">
                  <li class="flex items-center space-x-3">
                      <!-- Icon -->
                      <svg class="flex-shrink-0 w-5 h-5" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M4 4a2 2 0 00-2 2v1h16V6a2 2 0 00-2-2H4z"></path><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M18 9H2v5a2 2 0 002 2h12a2 2 0 002-2V9zM4 13a1 1 0 011-1h1a1 1 0 110 2H5a1 1 0 01-1-1zm5-1a1 1 0 100 2h1a1 1 0 100-2H9z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>
                      <span>All tools you need to manage payments</span>
                  </li>
                  <li class="flex items-center space-x-3">
                      <!-- Icon -->
                      <svg class="flex-shrink-0 w-5 h-5" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zM7 9a1 1 0 100-2 1 1 0 000 2zm7-1a1 1 0 11-2 0 1 1 0 012 0zm-.464 5.535a1 1 0 10-1.415-1.414 3 3 0 01-4.242 0 1 1 0 00-1.415 1.414 5 5 0 007.072 0z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>
                      <span>No setup, monthly, or hidden fees</span>
                  </li>
                  <li class="flex items-center space-x-3">
                      <!-- Icon -->
                      <svg class="flex-shrink-0 w-5 h-5" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M2.166 4.999A11.954 11.954 0 0010 1.944 11.954 11.954 0 0017.834 5c.11.65.166 1.32.166 2.001 0 5.225-3.34 9.67-8 11.317C5.34 16.67 2 12.225 2 7c0-.682.057-1.35.166-2.001zm11.541 3.708a1 1 0 00-1.414-1.414L9 10.586 7.707 9.293a1 1 0 00-1.414 1.414l2 2a1 1 0 001.414 0l4-4z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>
                      <span>Comprehensive security</span>
                  </li>
                  <li class="flex items-center space-x-3">
                      <!-- Icon -->
                      <svg class="flex-shrink-0 w-5 h-5" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M10.894 2.553a1 1 0 00-1.788 0l-7 14a1 1 0 001.169 1.409l5-1.429A1 1 0 009 15.571V11a1 1 0 112 0v4.571a1 1 0 00.725.962l5 1.428a1 1 0 001.17-1.408l-7-14z"></path></svg>
                      <span>Get hundreds of feature updates</span>
                  </li>
                  <li class="flex items-center space-x-3">
                      <!-- Icon -->
                      <svg class="flex-shrink-0 w-5 h-5" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M12.395 2.553a1 1 0 00-1.45-.385c-.345.23-.614.558-.822.88-.214.33-.403.713-.57 1.116-.334.804-.614 1.768-.84 2.734a31.365 31.365 0 00-.613 3.58 2.64 2.64 0 01-.945-1.067c-.328-.68-.398-1.534-.398-2.654A1 1 0 005.05 6.05 6.981 6.981 0 003 11a7 7 0 1011.95-4.95c-.592-.591-.98-.985-1.348-1.467-.363-.476-.724-1.063-1.207-2.03zM12.12 15.12A3 3 0 017 13s.879.5 2.5.5c0-1 .5-4 1.25-4.5.5 1 .786 1.293 1.371 1.879A2.99 2.99 0 0113 13a2.99 2.99 0 01-.879 2.121z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>
                      <span> Payouts to your bank account</span>
                  </li>
                  <li class="flex items-center space-x-3">
                      <!-- Icon -->
                      <svg class="flex-shrink-0 w-5 h-5" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M3 3a1 1 0 000 2v8a2 2 0 002 2h2.586l-1.293 1.293a1 1 0 101.414 1.414L10 15.414l2.293 2.293a1 1 0 001.414-1.414L12.414 15H15a2 2 0 002-2V5a1 1 0 100-2H3zm11 4a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 102 0V7zm-3 1a1 1 0 10-2 0v3a1 1 0 102 0V8zM8 9a1 1 0 00-2 0v2a1 1 0 102 0V9z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>
                      <span>Financial reconciliation and reporting</span>
                  </li>
                  <li class="flex items-center space-x-3">
                      <!-- Icon -->
                      <svg class="flex-shrink-0 w-5 h-5" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M18 10c0 3.866-3.582 7-8 7a8.841 8.841 0 01-4.083-.98L2 17l1.338-3.123C2.493 12.767 2 11.434 2 10c0-3.866 3.582-7 8-7s8 3.134 8 7zM7 9H5v2h2V9zm8 0h-2v2h2V9zM9 9h2v2H9V9z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>    
                      <span>24×7 phone, chat, and email support</span>
                  </li>
                  <li class="flex items-center space-x-3">
                      <!-- Icon -->
                      <svg class="flex-shrink-0 w-5 h-5" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M11 17a1 1 0 001.447.894l4-2A1 1 0 0017 15V9.236a1 1 0 00-1.447-.894l-4 2a1 1 0 00-.553.894V17zM15.211 6.276a1 1 0 000-1.788l-4.764-2.382a1 1 0 00-.894 0L4.789 4.488a1 1 0 000 1.788l4.764 2.382a1 1 0 00.894 0l4.764-2.382zM4.447 8.342A1 1 0 003 9.236V15a1 1 0 00.553.894l4 2A1 1 0 009 17v-5.764a1 1 0 00-.553-.894l-4-2z"></path></svg>
                      <span>Robust developer platform</span>
                  </li>
              </ul>
          </div>
      </div>
  </div>
</section>

================
File: views/privacy-policy.ejs
================
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <%- include('header', { title: "Privacy Policy - Bank-statements.co", description: "Read our privacy policy.", url: url }) %>
  <head>
    <style>
      .policy-container {
        max-width: 800px;
        margin: 0 auto;
        padding: 20px;
        line-height: 1.6;
      }
      .policy-container h2 {
        margin-top: 20px;
      }
      .policy-container p {
        margin: 10px 0;
      }
    </style>
  </head>
  <body>
    <div class="container">
      <%- include('navbar') %>
      <div class="page-container">
        <h1 class="text-center mb-8 custom-h1">Privacy Policy</h1>
        <div class="policy-container">
          <p><strong>Effective Date: 16 June 2024</strong></p>

          <p>Welcome to Bank-statements.co. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our website, <a href="https://www.bank-statements.co">https://www.bank-statements.co</a> ("Site"). Please read it carefully.</p>

          <h2>1. Information We Collect</h2>
          <p><strong>Personal Data:</strong></p>
          <ul>
            <li>Name</li>
            <li>Email</li>
            <li>Payment information</li>
          </ul>

          <p><strong>Non-Personal Data:</strong></p>
          <ul>
            <li>Web cookies</li>
          </ul>

          <h2>2. Purpose of Data Collection</h2>
          <p>We collect your personal data to process orders and provide our services to you.</p>

          <h2>3. Data Sharing</h2>
          <p>We do not share your personal data with any other parties.</p>

          <h2>4. Children's Privacy</h2>
          <p>We do not collect any data from children.</p>

          <h2>5. Cookies</h2>
          <p>We use cookies to enhance your experience on our Site. Cookies are small files stored on your device that help us analyze web traffic and improve our website. You can choose to accept or decline cookies through your browser settings.</p>

          <h2>6. Governing Law</h2>
          <p>This Privacy Policy is governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Australia, without regard to its conflict of law principles.</p>

          <h2>7. Changes to the Privacy Policy</h2>
          <p>We reserve the right to update or modify this Privacy Policy at any time. If we do so, we will notify users by email. Your continued use of the Site after any changes to the Privacy Policy indicates your acceptance of the new terms.</p>

          <h2>8. Contact Information</h2>
          <p>If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at <a href="mailto:info@bank-statements.co">info@bank-statements.co</a>.</p>
        </div>
      </div>
      <%- include('footer') %>
    </div>
  </body>
</html>

================
File: views/terms-of-service.ejs
================
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <%- include('header', { title: "Terms of Service - Bank-statements.co", description: "Read our Terms of Service.", url: url }) %>
  <head>
    <style>
      .terms-container {
        max-width: 800px;
        margin: 0 auto;
        padding: 20px;
        line-height: 1.6;
      }
      .terms-container h2 {
        margin-top: 20px;
      }
      .terms-container p {
        margin: 10px 0;
      }
    </style>
  </head>
  <body>
    <div class="container">
      <%- include('navbar', { isAuthenticated: isAuthenticated, creditBalance: creditBalance }) %>
      <div class="page-container">
        <h1 class="text-center mb-8 custom-h1">Terms of Service</h1>
        <div class="terms-container">
          <p><strong>Effective Date: 16 June 2024</strong></p>

          <p>Welcome to Bank-statements.co. By accessing or using our website, located at <a href="https://www.bank-statements.co">https://www.bank-statements.co</a> ("Site"), you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Use ("Terms"). Please review them carefully.</p>

          <h2>1. Acceptance of Terms</h2>
          <p>By accessing or using the Site, you agree to be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy, which can be found at <a href="https://www.bank-statements.co/privacy-policy">https://www.bank-statements.co/privacy-policy</a>. If you do not agree with any part of these Terms, you must not use the Site.</p>

          <h2>2. Services Provided</h2>
          <p>Bank-statements.co allows users to convert PDF bank statements from any bank in the world into Excel/CSV output with high accuracy and security.</p>

          <h2>3. User Data Collection</h2>
          <p>We collect personal data including name, email, and payment information. We also collect non-personal data through web cookies. For more details, please refer to our <a href="https://www.bank-statements.co/privacy-policy">Privacy Policy</a>.</p>

          <h2>4. User Responsibilities</h2>
          <p>You agree to use the Site for lawful purposes only. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account.</p>

          <h2>5. Intellectual Property</h2>
          <p>All content on the Site, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, and software, is the property of Bank-statements.co or its content suppliers and is protected by copyright laws. Unauthorized use of the content may violate copyright, trademark, and other laws.</p>

          <h2>6. Limitation of Liability</h2>
          <p>Bank-statements.co is not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages that result from the use of, or the inability to use, the Site or services provided. This includes but is not limited to reliance by a user on any information obtained from Bank-statements.co or that result from mistakes, omissions, interruptions, deletion of files or email, errors, defects, viruses, delays in operation or transmission, or any failure of performance.</p>

          <h2>7. Governing Law</h2>
          <p>These Terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Australia, without regard to its conflict of law principles.</p>

          <h2>8. Changes to Terms</h2>
          <p>We reserve the right to update or modify these Terms at any time. If we do so, we will notify users by email. Your continued use of the Site after any changes to the Terms indicates your acceptance of the new Terms.</p>

          <h2>9. Contact Information</h2>
          <p>If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at <a href="mailto:info@bank-statements.co">info@bank-statements.co</a>.</p>
        </div>
      </div>
      <%- include('footer') %>
    </div>
  </body>
</html>

================

================
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <%- include('header', { title: "Privacy Policy - Vidscript", description:
  "Read our privacy policy.", url: url }) %>
  <head>
    <style>
      .policy-container {
        max-width: 800px;
        margin: 0 auto;
        padding: 20px;
        line-height: 1.6;
      }
      .policy-container h2 {
        margin-top: 20px;
      }
      .policy-container p {
        margin: 10px 0;
      }
    </style>
  </head>
  <body>
    <div class="container">
      <%- include('navbar') %>
      <div class="page-container">
        <h1 class="text-center mb-8 custom-h1">Privacy Policy</h1>
        <div class="policy-container">
          <button class="btn">
            <span class="loading loading-spinner"></span>
            loading
          </button>
          <button class="btn btn-square">
            <span class="loading loading-spinner"></span>
          </button>
        </div>
      </div>
      <%- include('footer') %>
    </div>
  </body>
</html>

File: views/testimonies.ejs
================
<section class="bg-white dark:bg-gray-900">
    <div class="py-8 px-4 mx-auto max-w-screen-xl lg:py-16 lg:px-6">
        <div class="mx-auto max-w-screen-md text-center">
            <h2 class="mb-4 text-4xl tracking-tight font-extrabold text-gray-900 dark:text-white">Testimonials</h2>
            <p class="mb-8 font-light text-gray-500 lg:mb-16 dark:text-gray-400 sm:text-xl">Discover what our satisfied customers have to say about our secure and accurate PDF to Excel/CSV conversion service.</p>
        </div> 
        <div class="grid gap-8 lg:grid-cols-3">
            <div class="space-y-6">
                <figure class="p-6 bg-gray-50 rounded dark:bg-gray-800">
                    <blockquote class="text-sm text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400">
                        <h3 class="text-lg font-semibold text-gray-900 dark:text-white">Efficient and Reliable</h3>
